sub_topic: Determination of the pH of a solution using a pH meter
message_1: What is the pH of a 0.1 M solution of hydrochloric acid if the pH meter reading is 1.5?
message_2: The pH meter reading indicates the pH of the solution. In this case, the pH of the 0.1 M hydrochloric acid (HCl) solution is 1.5. There is no need to calculate the pH since the pH meter has already provided the value.
